Description:
Under offer
This stunning Barrabool sandstone and weatherboard residence (circa 1861) provides a rare opportunity with over 150 years of history, character and individuality to create your own piece of history by further renovating and adding your stamp to this unique residence. Originally built by pioneer Swiss vignerons, this property has historical significance for its associations with the winemaking industry in colonial Victoria, and the breathtaking cellar transports us back in time. Neuchatel covers approximately two acres and is located in the prestigious rolling hills of Barrabool, just a stones throw from the Ceres township where peace and tranquillity is the way of life.
While a new extension would enhance the size, this gorgeous cottage currently comprises three bedrooms with original features. Master bedroom with a deep-set colonial window creates a very special ambience and charm, two childrens bedrooms, a functional family bathroom, a simple and light-filled kitchen that looks out to the yard, separate sitting room and a large north-facing dining and lounge with polished floorboards and fireplaces. French doors open to a verandah and alfresco deck thats ideal for outdoor living and entertaining. A stunning and unique feature of this residence is the 3x6 metre sandstone basement cellar.
Surrounded by a manicured hedged garden and century-old trees, outdoor features include an original coach house and stables, minor sheds, vegetable gardens, childrens play area, original Chasselas grapevine and 50,000 litres of water storage.
With a bus stop to private schools directly outside the property, easy access to Highton Village shops and cafes, Geelong CBD and the Surf Coast, and one hour to Melbourne CBD via the Ring Road, Neuchatel is ideally located to maximise all the benefits of country living, while being close to amenities.
Move in today and soak up the history, or put your own special mark on the property with opportunities to renovate and extend.
For more information on this property text '460 Merrawarp' to 0428 444 841

Description:
AS GOOD AS IT GETS IN OLD TORQUAY!!
OFFERS CLOSING MONDAY 1st JUNE 2020 AT 5PM (If Not Sold Prior)
For those people who have been on a relenting quest to find the ideally located allotment to build their forever home in Old Torquay, your search may be at an end. Alternatively, number 2 Spring Street offers a rare prospect to secure a development opportunity (STCA) in a unbeatable location, being only metres to Taylor Park, with a rear northern orientation and near impossible to find, 21.94m frontage.
The Old Torquay classic beach home will be the perfect beach getaway or investment property whilst you navigate through the exciting time of planning the properties next chapter in this incredible Coastal environment. The property has two sizeable bedrooms, open plan living, dining and kitchen with an original cosy wood fireplace, appealing timber bench tops, substantial cupboard space with the area offering a delightful outlook onto an entertaining deck and rear north facing back yard. A modernised family bathroom, laundry and shed round out the improvements on the fantastic proposition.
Situated on a 588m2 (approx.) allotment within minutes walking distance to Fishermans, Whites and Front Beach, Gilbert Street shopping centre, surfing retail precinct, cafes, restaurants and schools allowing the owner the luxury of parking the car and hanging up the keys. Considered by many as the best location in town, the property will attract the most discerning buyer who realises opportunities like these a few and far between. Call today for more information.
Insights: 2 Spring Street, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
FAMILY ENTERTAINER WITH ROOM FOR THE CARS, BOAT, CARAVAN & MORE!
CONTACT US TODAY TO ARRANGE YOUR ONE-ON-ONE APPOINTMENT
Fastidiously maintained, look no further than this stunning family entertainer with plenty of room to move and something to offer everyone! With multiple living and entertaining zones to keep everyone occupied indoors - outdoors offers the tradesman or car enthusiast the ultimate 6.4m x 10m garage and workshop to tinker, store cars, the boat or caravan, the trailer and more.
Beyond the striking facade, step inside and be delighted by high ceilings and stunning Tasmanian Oak hardwood flooring throughout. Positioned at the front of the home, the Master suite provides a relaxing retreat with a substantial walk in robe, and a large ensuite with double vanity, oversize shower and toilet. A lounge area located off the entrance hallway also provides a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of the main living areas.
At the hub of the home, the open plan kitchen/living/and dining area will be an entertainers delight. The spacious kitchen, featuring stone bench tops and large L-shaped island bench, stainless appliances including a 900mm oven with gas cook top and exceptional storage - oversees the dining and 2 additional living areas - one perfectly designed and positioned for a children's playroom.
Theres a natural flow out to the timber deck where seamless indoor/outdoor living is made possible by timber framed sliding doors. The fully landscaped North facing backyard can be enjoyed from the deck, with a fenced and secure yard with plenty of space for the kids and pets to play.
Separately zoned off their own hallway, three more bedrooms each with built-in robes allow plenty of space for the larger family or regular guests. All get to enjoy the cleverly placed bathroom with shower and tub, and separate toilet.
Additional features include an oversized double garage with remote and internal access through the laundry, ducted heating, split system cooling, stone bench tops to all wet areas, and a garden shed to store the lawnmower and rake and keep the garage and workshop clutter free!
Within minutes to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Epworth Hospital, Leisurelink fitness centre, transportation including bus services and the Waurn Ponds train station, not to mention a mere 20 minute trip to Surfcoast beaches - this impressive family residence will tick all the boxes for those seeking space, storage, and a multitude of lifestyle options. 
Do not delay your opportunity to inspect this magnificent residence in this highly-sought after and popular location - this one will certainly not last long!
Insights: 202 Heyers Road, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat and tidy with loads of space.
On its own title this two-bedroom unit is located within easy access to the Surfcoast, Waurn Ponds shopping Centre, Peter Street shops, Marshalltown station and Geelong CBD. The central kitchen has loads of storage and a new gas cooker and new flooring, there is a spacious open plan living and dining area with split system reverse cycle and gas wall furnace and a glass sliding door takes you to the elevated and covered timber deck the perfect spot for all year round entertaining. The main bedroom is generous in size, with built in robes and direct access to the family bathroom which offers an oversized shower, bath and vanity again this space has new flooring. The second bedroom also has built in robes. There is a spacious laundry and the garage has secure internal access to the house. With its own street frontage, with easy care gardens both front and back, making this is a brilliant first home or investment opportunity.
Insights: 2/4 Felix Street, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 32 other 2 bedroom unit in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Pretty as a picture
Story Book is the perfect way to describe this gorgeous home. It has cleverly been designed to capture the breathtaking views with the family living and kitchen taking full advantage. On approx. 680m2, it provides a great size rear yard for children to play and entertain plus a balcony from the kitchen/ dining allows for entertaining or relaxing while taking in those fabulous views. The light filled kitchen has a stainless steel 900mm oven/cooktop and dishwasher.
A cosy floorplan offers three bedrooms, study, two bathrooms and two living areas. Split system heating and cooling, Coonara wood fire in the living area, water tank, garden shed and double carport plus extra driveway for parking. The location offers easy access to the Ring Road for the Melbourne commute as well as the convenience of the nearby Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza.
Perfect for a young family or couple looking to get into one of Hightons most popular locations.
For more information on this property text '133 Grantham' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Family Living in a Tranquil Setting
Tucked away in a sought after pocket of Belmont is this wonderful family home that is sure to impress. Situated on a generous land size of 817sqm (approx.) and surrounded by beautiful established gardens, the home provides spacious yet private living. Ideal for young families, located only a stones throw from the Barwon river, parks and playgrounds. The home features beautiful timber floors, a spacious front living with adjacent meals area, three bedrooms all with built-in robes, functional updated kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and plenty of bench space, bathroom with shower, spa and separate toilet. Out the back is a fantastic large family living and dining space that's abundantly light filled with its large windows and central atrium. Extra comforts include ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout. Outside features an abundance of gardens, a large double garage and plenty of off-street parking. Conveniently close to schools, shops and the Geelong CBD, this wonderful home must be inspected!
Insights: 2 Riverglen Court, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Convenient lifestyle.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam on 0406 597 050.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Tucked away in an upheld pocket of Grovedale, lies this lovely family lifestyle property. Within just minutes from all your daily amenities within the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, abundance of schools and the Ring Road, your daily commute will become seamless.
Spacious design fabulous for entertaining, incorporated with low maintenance living, makes for easy living for the demands of a growing family. A versatile floor plan shows four bedrooms, spacious living, kitchen and dining area, and an alfresco area provides flexibility for entertaining.
The master bedroom features built in robes and ensuite, plus 2 more bedrooms with built in robes. Situated on a generous 774sqm (approx.) allotment, allows a growing family to use it over the years to its full potential. The added bonus to safely store a caravan/boat/trailer is bound to appeal to those who like their toys, when car accommodation is already taken care of within the double car garage and ample space up the drive.
This home ticks all the boxes. Ideally located, close to Grovedale West, Mandama, and Nazareth Primary, and only a 10 minute walk away from Leisure Link, and all the shops, restaurants and cafes that the shopping mecca has to offer.
Don't miss this amazing opportunity to secure your perfect family residence. Call to arrange your private inspection.
3D walk through virtual tour available, please follow the link below or contact Cameron on 0406 597 050 to view.

Description:
Superbly renovated entertainers dream.
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew on 0433 176 611.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Perfect for the convenience seeking family searching for abundant accommodation all located in a quiet Grovedale pocket within close proximity to a range of services. Having recently been renovated throughout this property allows you to move in and enjoy from day one making it a lifestyle location for now and well into the future.
This stunning family home consists of four bedrooms master with ensuite, central bathroom located for ease of day to day living for the remaining three bedrooms. Open plan living, kitchen and dining area leading you to the undercover outdoor entertaining area perfect for all year round use.
Features include two split systems, dishwasher, 900mm oven, gas log fire, shed / workshop and double carport. Positioned on approx. 771 sqm this block allows you plenty of off street parking for cars, caravans or trailers. Rounding out this sensational offering is the immaculately maintained gardens throughout.
Grovedale is commonly noted as one of the most conveniently located suburbs of Geelong complimented by the ever expanding Waurn Ponds Shopping Plaza, world class Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, multiple schools, state of the art sporting facilities and easily connecting to Melbourne Via Waurn Ponds and Marshall train stations or the Ring Road (M1) taking you to the CBD in an hour. Walking distance to the Grovedale Central Shopping Centre and close proximity to bus stops. This is certainly a great opportunity not to be missed. Book your inspection here today!!

Description:
Prestige on Pepperdine
Located in the prestigious Pepperdine Way, this Wookey built fully renovated brick home is a short stroll to parklands, just minutes from Christian College, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and Highton Village. Capturing stunning views from the kitchen and living, you cant help but admire the outlook. From the outset a distinguished sense of quality is evident, from beautifully manicured gardens to well thought out interiors, every element of the home has been thoughtfully considered. The home comprises two spacious living areas, the lounge room featuring stunning vaulted timber ceilings, while the light filled living room provides direct access to the entertaining area. The spacious kitchen features high end Miele induction cooktop, oven, Asko dishwasher and soft close drawers. 4 large bedrooms including master with ensuite, plus fully renovated, modern central bathroom.
Extra features include:
- Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling,
- New carpets
- Freshly painted
- Solar panels
- Garden Shed
- Double garage
- Side access
Ideal for families and set on a huge parcel of land (approximately 792sqm), this beautiful home soaks up the north and western sunlight and provides an abundance of space for the kids to play.
Dont miss this rare opportunity to secure a home in one of Hightons most tightly held pockets!
Insights: 15 Pepperdine Way, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Magical Views the Backdrop to Well Designed Family Living
Perched high on the hill beside the banks of the Barwon River, this magnificent family home has been designed to take advantage of its breath-taking views at every opportunity, providing a stunning back drop to everyday living and a spectacular setting for truly impressive entertaining. Situated in the tightly held Queens Park pocket of Highton, this is a wonderful opportunity to secure your piece of this incredibly picturesque riverside precinct.
The entrance to this home immediately captures your attention with sky high ceilings and architectural features hinting at what lies beyond in the split-level plan. Moving down the circular staircase, the main living area is revealed along with the amazing scenery on display through large glass sliders overlooking the river and across the city. The kitchen and dining are centrally located and adjoin both the main living and second living area providing separate zones to escape whilst remaining well connected. All living on this level is oriented to enjoy the beautiful landscape on offer and flows easily out to the paved outdoor terrace and viewing deck, the perfect set up for entertaining.
The considered floor plan caters perfectly to family living providing both open-plan living and private retreats for all its inhabitants. The top level of the home consists of a luxurious master suite including walk in robe and ensuite, parents retreat and huge home office with ample space for two people to work harmoniously from home. Again, all rooms on this level come with that spectacular view. Four bedrooms located in a separate wing on the ground level of the home are serviced by a spacious powder and bathroom.
Outdoors, paved and decked areas provide plenty of options to sit and enjoy the surrounds and landscaped gardens. Leading on from the outdoor entertaining, a secluded path leads you to a perfectly positioned outdoor spa. Hidden amongst the established greenery, this is the perfect place to relax and take in the absolute beauty of the area from the lush river surrounds of the day time to the twinkling skyscape of an evening, this is truly magical.
This home is unique, the setting is unrivalled and your window of opportunity is here. Dont miss this your chance to make this outstanding property yours.
Insights: 21 Montrose Place, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful design meets amazing Jan Juc ocean views
Youll love:
Absolutely EVERYTHING about this architecturally designed home in Jan Juc, which is the epitome of beautiful style & modern living.
Incredible views of the breaking surf that cant be built out; plus the central courtyard at the heart of the home thats north facing, sunny & private.
The impressive craftsmanship and quality finishes found throughout like timber cabinetry, polished concrete floors & the huge 3.6m windows/doors leading to the courtyard.
An open plan kitchen/living/dining area thats ideal for entertaining & would also look right at home on the cover of a glossy magazine!
Plus:
The master with ensuite & WIRs occupies the top floor & takes in the ocean views.
Bedrooms 2 & 3 are located on the main level in a separate wing away from the living area.
Hydronic heating throughout & a split system in the main living complement the homes passive design, ensuring youll stay warmer in winter & cooler in summer.
Other impeccable features include the choice of pendant lighting & tiling throughout, 5.5m x 6.5m garage, plus the under stair storage & soft new carpets in the bedrooms.
Insights: 3 Meaby St, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional Quality in Ideal Location
Located in the much sought-after pocket of Leopold, this immaculate family home is a delight to inspect. Offering a fantastic, adaptable floorplan including an amazing outdoor alfresco entertaining area, this home is sure to suit a multitude of buyers.
Positioned on a fully landscaped and beautifully presented allotment of 648m2 approx., this stunningly presented family home will leave you wanting for nothing.
From the moment you enter the home it will be perfectly evident that the highest attention to detail has been carried out throughout every aspect of this home. Featuring four spacious bedrooms, the main bedroom boasts a private ensuite and a walk-in robe with great storage. All other bedrooms comprise of built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
With three separate living zones, there is no doubt that there is an abundance of space for everyone. Comprising a rumpus room, perfect to utilise a kids playroom, the open plan living area and an additional separate lounge/ study, located at the front of the home an featuring built in bench & cupboards. The well-appointed kitchen defines the central hub of the home and includes a walk-in pantry, 900mm free standing gas cook top & oven and expansive island stone bench overlooking the main living and dining area.
The main living area extends beautifully onto the impressive undercover alfresco. Surrounded by beautiful gardens, shade sails and a ceiling fan for all year-round comfort, it will make indoor, outdoor entertaining a breeze. The rear yard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The oversized remote double lock-up garage features internal and rear roller door access for extra car accommodation. The garden shed provides extra storage.
This stunning property features top of the range fixtures and fittings, downlights, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system AC, tinted windows & a beautiful street scape.
This location places you footsteps away from reserves and playgrouds. Leopold Primary School and the Leopold Community Hub are within close reach, along with the Gateway Plaza and local sporting grounds. The Portarlington Highway grants easy access to the delights of both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
This property showcases the superior blend of spacious, convenient, family living and outstanding value for money. An ideal lifestyle is on offer and wont last long, an inspection is a must!
Insights: 38 Yeoman Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
A quality home in a quiet location
Youll love:
This modern, open plan home features polished concrete floors, neutral tones & 2 separate living areas.
The private & sunny backyard has a large deck with a leafy green aspect & cosy outdoor fireplace offering a sense of tranquillity all year-round.
The well-appointed kitchen & raked ceiling above the spacious adjoining meals & living area adds a luxurious feel to this home.
Plus:
In addition to the master with WIRs & ensuite, theres another 3 generously sized bedrooms all with built-in robes.
The cleverly designed floorplan incorporates a separate kids / guests wing with a 2nd living room & spacious bathroom.
Plenty of extras including quality hydronic heating, plantation shutters & good storage options throughout.
Located on a quiet street in a well-established neighbourhood with Pirate park at the bottom of the road plus beaches, shops & schools all within walking distance.

Description:
Spacious & modern living thats close to it all!
Youll love:
The generous floorplan & convenient location of this home thats in a well-established and desirable part of Torquay.
Having a spacious formal sitting room with an electric fireplace, plus a large open living room with ocean glimpses from an adjoining balcony upstairs.
Entertaining friends & family in the sunny, low-maintenance backyard that wraps around the home and incorporates a large undercover alfresco area too.
Plus:
The spacious kitchen features quality Caesarstone benchtops, Qasair rangehood and a huge walk-in-pantry!
Theres also an informal dining area with stacker doors that open into the backyard & a large home theatre room.
Enjoy soft carpet, generous robes and a/c units in all bedrooms; including the luxurious walk-through robe & ensuite with double vanities in the master.
Other features include natural timber & stone accents throughout, 3kw solar panels, plus the ducted vacuum system, double remote garage, ample storage options & more.

Superb single level townhouse on its own 323m2 approx. allotment
This quality constructed and beautifully finished modern townhouse presents as new and will delight on inspection. Features include a formal entry, large open plan living and dining room adjacent to the designer kitchen, three generous bedrooms (master with en-suite and WIR, the others with robes) serviced by the main bathroom, full size laundry and direct access to a large double garage. The covered entertainment area leads directly from the main living areas. Located close to transport and local amenities this quality home offers the easy-care lifestyle you have been searching for. Flexible settlement can be discussed for those that need to sell.

Description:
Superb family residence on 1,074m2 approx. allotment with northern rear aspect
This quality home has been designed to create a private and secure street frontage that will amaze you once you enter. The entry opens to a huge sunken lounge and dining room with a raised study area near the entry. The four bedrooms are of generous proportions and the master has a walk in robe and en-suite with the main bathroom well positioned to service the others. At the rear is the large open plan Family/Dining room that is adjacent to the cleverly designed kitchen that will impress those that love to cook. The rear entertainment deck flows from the rear living area and overlooks the delightful rear garden. A huge 4 vehicle Garage /Workshop will impress those with lots of toys to keep safe. This is the sort of home you could live in as is easily while you renovate the existing footprint over time without the need for further extension. Located close to all that a quality Highton address has to offer and just a short stroll to highly regarded Highton Primary School that offers the IB International Baccalaureate Program..

Description:
A Jan Juc Coastal Haven
Enjoying an elevated position in a quiet court and just 250m from the Jan Juc clifftop, is this classic beach house with a sunny North aspect and outlook over the rolling hills.
Nestled among well established and maintained gardens, the house is full of natural light and possesses a true coastal charm.
A desirable location that is highly sought after on the beach side of Sunset Strip and just a short walk to the Jan Juc shops, clifftop walks, beaches and the Bob Pettit Reserve. This property really is a surfers ultimate dream!
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Spotted Gum hardwood timber floors
- Split level design
- Exposed timber ceiling beams
- Stainless steel kitchen appliances, induction cook top
- Ducted heating/cooling and cosy wood fire place
- Three bedrooms plus rumpus room/fourth bedroom
- Family bathroom with bathtub
- Versatile ground floor, great for those running a home business
- Funky Penny Round Lino to the downstairs entrance/mudroom
- Freshly painted inside and out
- Brand new carpet
- Garden shed, cubby house and lock up garage with workshop
- Private, peaceful fenced yard and garden with fruit trees
- Extensive deck areas and outdoor hot/cold shower
What The VENDOR LOVES:
The panoramic views and the warm colours made us feel home the first time we walked into the house. Ample parking space is perfectly suited for starting or growing a business, its a dream house for our family. We love that we can walk to the beach easily, five point breaks within walking distance, jogging the cliff top track towards Bells Beach or Torquay, and accessing the mountain bike tracks in the Ironbark Basin. We are far away from any busy roads and in a community with lots of kind people.
Internal area
185.8m²

Description:
Pristine Jan Juc Acreage
***Enter Bells Boulevard from Great Ocean Road whilst road works underway***
Build your dream home on this pristine 3.2 acre (approx.) allotment, nestled amongst yellow gums and beautiful native flora and only a 2 minute drive from world renowned Bells Beach are just some of the reasons why this block is an amazing opportunity.
With a Northerly aspect and a gentle fall to the rear, this block has a huge 5000m2 (approx.) building envelope with electricity, water and telephone available.
This is your opportunity to obtain one of the last remaining untouched bush blocks in the area.
Moments to Point Addis National Park, Iron Bark basin walking tracks, Torquay and Anglesea, this exclusive parcel of land is a dream come true.
Call now to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Faultless location meets charming renovation
For sale by Openn Negotiation (a flexible term online auction). The auction has commenced and the property can sell at any time. Contact Ricky on 0438 307 579 or William on 0488 706 144 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
No matter what type of property you're searching for, whether it's your first home, new family home or an investment property, this newly renovated home will be sure to impress. Set on a generous 640sqm approx. allotment with three generously proportioned bedrooms, master with spacious walk-in robe, ensuite and superior finishes. The open plan kitchen, living and dining area incorporates an abundance of natural sunlight which provides a seamless connection to the outdoors.
- Three spacious bedrooms, master with walk-in robe and ensuite
- Modern and stylish open plan kitchen, living and dining area
- Kitchen with 900mm stainless steel oven and dishwasher
- 7.5kw Split-system air conditioning, oversized ducted central heating
- Spacious and private rear yard, low maintenance living throughout
- Renovation includes new roof with insulation throughout
- New plaster, square set ceilings, floor to ceiling tiles in bathroom
- Frameless shower screens, instant hot water and new fences
- 5 Minutes to Leopold Primary School and local shopping centre
- 15 Minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens
Insights: 25 The Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Add Value and Reap the Rewards
Here is a chance to add value to a property that is bursting with potential and reap the rewards of an astute investment.
This brick and tile residence features a sunny kitchen and dining area that adjoins a generous living zone with large windows for abundant natural light, and a gas heater to keep things cosy. There is plentiful storage throughout, including built in robes in the three bedrooms, a large walk in pantry in the kitchen, and an ample linen press and cupboard. It is easy to see that this home could be transformed into something special with a contemporary feel while retaining its charming original features including the character filled solid timber flooring.
The 693m² (approx) allotment offers potential to extend the footprint if required; alternatively, with the existing home well positioned, explore the possible development of the site (all STCA). The north facing rear garden is fenced and a lock up garage provides secure storage and parking.
Located in an established and family friendly area, everything you need is close by. Schools, shops and parks are minutes away and Geelong is less than a twenty minute commute. This home is also ideally placed to make the most of harbour side beaches for boating and fishing; and coastal hotspots are easily accessed too. Land bank for the future, move in and make it your own or capitalise on the potential right now, either way this is an exciting and rare opportunity.
Insights: 29 Carroll Street, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Easy Coastal Living in Peaceful Location
Positioned on a corner block in the peaceful river-end of town, this white weatherboard home with bright interior, high ceilings and warm hardwood flooring is the perfect beach house. Young families will love the quiet neighbourhood and nearby Village Park, while investors will see potential for a low-maintenance holiday home or short-term rental.
North-facing, the verandah provides a delightful spot for a morning coffee; dense foliage promotes privacy. The characterful stained glass front door is welcoming, and reveals the entranceway and the two minor bedrooms, each with BIRs.
The kitchen comes with Westinghouse oven/cooktop, dishwasher, and sociable island bench overlooking the lofty, open-plan dining/living space. With its garden outlook and fresh white walls, the main living is a relaxing place to retreat after a day at the beach.
The master bedroom boasts a WIR and ensuite with corner shower, and the main bathroom comes with over-bath shower and vanity, with a separate WC ensuring privacy. Adjacent, the laundry leads to a single lock-up garage with front and rear roller door access. Outdoor entertaining is encouraged in the private, undercover paved courtyard, and a patch of lawn offers a spot for the kids or pets to frolick.
Parks, playgrounds and the stunning Barwon River are all just a short walk away, and the main streets boutiques, cafes and amenities are not much further. Enjoy all that Barwon Heads and surrounds have to offer, in this low-maintenance beach house with easy coastal living at its heart. Inspect today!
Insights: 23 Knox Drive, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 32 other 3 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.
